channel.title: LaTeX on rOpenGov - R packages for open government data analytics
channel.description: Recent content in LaTeX on rOpenGov - R packages for open government data analytics

item.title: Reproducible posters with R, LaTeX, tikz and Sweave
item.description: rOpenGov is all about reproducible research, so preparing a reproducible poster became our mission after having the chance to present at International Conference on Computational Social Science (ICCSS 2015) in Helsinki, June 8-11, 2015 (poster 36 in Monday session 15:30-17:00). We blended R code and output with the standard poster contents. The poster sources download data with our eurostat R package and automatically generates the final figures and the overall layout.
